text: Alain Boghossian (born 27 October 1970) is a former French football player. He played as a midfielder. He played for Marseille II, Istres, Marseille, Napoli, Sampdoria, Parma, Espanyol, and the France national team. ==International goals== :Scores and results list France's goal tally first, score column indicates score after each Boghossian goal. List of international goals scored by Alain Boghossian No. Date Venue Opponent Score Result Competition 1 19 August 1998 Ernst-Happel-Stadion, Vienna, Austria 2–2 2–2 Friendly 2 10 October 1998 Luzhniki Stadium, Moscow, Russia 3–2 3–2 Euro 2000 Q ==Honours== Parma *Coppa Italia: 1998–99, 2001–02 *UEFA Cup: 1998–99 *Supercoppa Italiana: 1999 France *FIFA World Cup: 1998 Orders *Knight of the Legion of Honour: 1998 == References == Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Footballers from Provence-Alpes-Cote d'Azur Category:Association football midfielders Category:1998 FIFA World Cup players Category:2002 FIFA World Cup players Category:Alpes-de-Haute-Provence
title: Alain Boghossian
